name: osh-airlines-deployment
description: OSH Airlines - Full Stack Flight Booking System - Deployment Ready

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install --omit=dev && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install --omit=dev && npm run build
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install --omit=dev && cd ../backend && npm install --omit=dev
